name: War
summary:
WAR, Grow's famous strategy game, now has 2 boards for you to play in electrifying battles!

Classic Game: Feel like a real general. Aim for your goal and carefully define your strategy. Attack at the right time, protect your borders and defend your territories. Dominate entire continents, invade and conquer opposing territories. But make sure you evaluate your moves carefully because, just like in great wars, poorly planned attacks can bring down great powers while the right strategy can turn small armies into great empires!

Roman Empire Game: With internal conflicts and barbarian invasions on the increase, the time has come for the CAESARS, the Roman Emperors, to rise. Be a true strategist in command of entire Roman legions and conquer the greatest empire the world has ever seen.

Gather your friends and play the digital version of this classic game. The app makes the game much faster and more dynamic, making the matches last much less time than in the board version.
